description:
This online interactive forum (Polis) was used for the first phase of engagement on updates to Newton's village center zoning districts. This forum was open from late May through October 4rd, 2021 to those who live, work or shop in Newton.

Go to this website in order to see all of the information gathered during this engagement phase and to learn about the next steps, including the City of Newton staff and consultant Utile's presentations to the Zoning and Planning Committee on October 25th as well as the public information session on November 15th: https://newtonma.gov/zoningredesign/vc

See a more complete set of results from the online interactive forum here: https://pol.is/report/r8aupmcmvjppbyydmuemk
